pullRequest.title: Add java API to add or remove CustomizedStateAggregationConfig
pullRequest.bodyText:
Issues

 My PR addresses the following Helix issues and references them in the PR title:
Fixes #790

Description


 Here are some details about my PR, including screenshots of any UI changes:
In this PR the below APIs have been added.
1- addCustomizedStateAggregationConfig
2- removeCustomizedStateAggregationConfig.
Tests have been added to check the functionality of these APIs.


 The following tests are written for this issue:
TestZkHelixAdmin.testAddCustomizedStateAggregationConfig
TestZkHelixAdmin.testRemoveCustomizedStateAggregationConfig


 The following is the result of the "mvn test" command on the appropriate module:
[INFO] Tests run: 907, Failures: 0, Errors: 0, Skipped: 0, Time elapsed: 3,482.288 s - in TestSuite
[INFO]
[INFO] Results:
[INFO]
[INFO] Tests run: 907, Failures: 0, Errors: 0, Skipped: 0
[INFO]
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO] BUILD SUCCESS
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO] Total time:  58:07 min
[INFO] Finished at: 2020-02-20T15:52:51-08:00
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------


Commits

 My commits all reference appropriate Apache Helix GitHub issues in their subject lines, and I have squashed multiple commits if they address the same issue. In addition, my commits follow the guidelines from "How to write a good git commit message":

Subject is separated from body by a blank line
Subject is limited to 50 characters (not including Jira issue reference)
Subject does not end with a period
Subject uses the imperative mood ("add", not "adding")
Body wraps at 72 characters
Body explains "what" and "why", not "how"



Code Quality

 My diff has been formatted using helix-style.xml

commit.message:
Add java API to add or remove CustomizedStateAggregationConfig

In this commit the below APIs have been added.
1- addCustomizedStateAggregationConfig
2- removeCustomizedStateAggregationConfig.
Tests have been added to check the functionality of these APIs.

nodes.bodyText: If a user would like to add one type of state or remove one type of state, how to do it? It seems the API is to add or remove the config as a whole, but in most cases, we will use it as a way to add/remove one item in the list view.

commit.message: Add API for adding and removing type from config

beforeCommit.message: Add API for adding and removing type from config

afterCommit.message: Add API for adding and removing type from config
